item.description:
Hola Todos,

We are going to try to have a weeknight Framingham Spanish Meetup. Some members have stated that they cannot make the weekend day, so we are going to attempt a weeknight meetup in addition to Saturday's meetings. Everyone is invited to attend. In the future, if there is an interest I will try to schedule the meeting in between the Saturday meetings. For the summer it appears we will have a Saturday meeting every three weeks, during the winter probably every other Saturday.

If we have the support we will continue with a weekday meeting. I find these Meetup venues an excellent way to practice speaking the languages we are studying. I am a member of several French and Spanish meetups. Hopefully, we will have an interest in the weeknight meetings and moderate attendance, especially among those who have specifically stated they would prefer a weeknight meeting. The day and week of the month is flexible now, although once we figure it out, I would like to keep to the same location, same day and same week of the month.

This is kind of an exciting expansion of what I have found to be an excellent, informative, fun and great group. If you have any questions contact myself or Peter.

group.name: The MetroWest-Greater Boston Castellano Speakers Group

item.name: Weeknight Framingham Spanish Meetup
